verses.verse: And it came to <S%H1961>pass<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>things,<s%> that one <S%H559>told<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> thy <S%H1>father<s%> is <S%H2470>sick:<s%> and he <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> <S%H853>him<s%> his <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1121>sons,<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> and <S%H669>Ephraim.<s%>

And one <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> thy <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H935>cometh<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> thee: and <S%H3478>Israel<s%> strengthened <S%H2388>himself,<s%> and <S%H3427>sat<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H4296>bed.<s%>

And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> <S%H7706>Almighty<s%> <S%H7200>appeared<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me at <S%H3870>Luz<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%> and <S%H1288>blessed<s%> me,

And <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me, <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> I will make thee <S%H6509>fruitful,<s%> and <S%H7235>multiply<s%> thee, and I will <S%H5414>make<s%> of thee a <S%H6951>multitude<s%> of <S%H5971>people;<s%> and will <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> to thy <S%H2233>seed<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> thee for an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H272>possession.<s%>

And <S%H6258>now<s%> thy <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1121>sons,<s%> <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> and <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%> which were <S%H3205>born<s%> unto thee in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> <S%H5704>before<s%> I <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> thee into <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> are mine; as <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> and <S%H8095>Simeon,<s%> they shall <S%H1961>be<s%> mine.

And thy <S%H4138>issue,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> thou <S%H3205>begettest<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> them, shall <S%H1961>be<s%> thine, and shall be <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H5921>after<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of their <S%H251>brethren<s%> in their <S%H5159>inheritance.<s%>

And as for <S%H589>me,<s%> when I <S%H935>came<s%> from <S%H4480>Padan,<s%> <S%H6307><s%> <S%H7354>Rachel<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%> <S%H5921>by<s%> me in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%> in the <S%H1870>way,<s%> when <S%H5750>yet<s%> there was but a <S%H3530>little<s%> <S%H776>way<s%> to <S%H935>come<s%> unto <S%H672>Ephrath:<s%> and I <S%H6912>buried<s%> her <S%H8033>there<s%> in the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H672>Ephrath;<s%> the <S%H1931>same<s%> is <S%H1035>Bethlehem.<s%>
And <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7200>beheld<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph's<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4310>Who<s%> are <S%H428>these?<s%>

And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> his <S%H1>father,<s%> <S%H1992>They<s%> are my <S%H1121>sons,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H5414>given<s%> me in <S%H2088>this<s%> place. And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3947>Bring<s%> them, I pray <S%H4994>thee,<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me, and I will <S%H1288>bless<s%> them.

Now the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> were <S%H3513>dim<s%> for <S%H4480>age,<s%> <S%H2207><s%> so that he <S%H3201>could<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7200>see.<s%> And he brought them <S%H5066>near<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him; and he <S%H5401>kissed<s%> them, and <S%H2263>embraced<s%> them.

And <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> I had <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H6419>thought<s%> to <S%H7200>see<s%> thy <S%H6440>face:<s%> and, <S%H2009>lo,<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H7200>showed<s%> me <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H853><s%> thy <S%H2233>seed.<s%>

And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> brought them <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H853><s%> from <S%H4480>between<s%> <S%H5973><s%> his <S%H1290>knees,<s%> and he bowed <S%H7812>himself<s%> with his <S%H639>face<s%> to the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H853><s%> them <S%H8147>both,<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> in his right <S%H3225>hand<s%> toward <S%H3478>Israel's<s%> left <S%H4480>hand,<s%> <S%H8040><s%> and <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> in his left <S%H8040>hand<s%> toward <S%H3478>Israel's<s%> right <S%H4480>hand,<s%> <S%H3225><s%> and brought them <S%H5066>near<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him.

And <S%H3478>Israel<s%> stretched <S%H7971>out<s%> <S%H853><s%> his right <S%H3225>hand,<s%> and <S%H7896>laid<s%> it <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H669>Ephraim's<s%> <S%H7218>head,<s%> <S%H1931>who<s%> was the <S%H6810>younger,<s%> and his left <S%H8040>hand<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H4519>Manasseh's<s%> <S%H7218>head,<s%> guiding his hands <S%H7919>wittingly;<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3027><s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> was the <S%H1060>firstborn.<s%>

And he <S%H1288>blessed<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> my <S%H1>fathers<s%> <S%H85>Abraham<s%> and <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> did <S%H1980>walk,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> which <S%H7462>fed<s%> me all my life <S%H4480>long<s%> <S%H5750><s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%>

The <S%H4397>Angel<s%> which <S%H1350>redeemed<s%> me from <S%H4480>all<s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H7451>evil,<s%> <S%H1288>bless<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5288>lads;<s%> and let my <S%H8034>name<s%> be <S%H7121>named<s%> on them, and the <S%H8034>name<s%> of my <S%H1>fathers<s%> <S%H85>Abraham<s%> and <S%H3327>Isaac;<s%> and let them <S%H1711>grow<s%> into a <S%H7230>multitude<s%> in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

And when <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H7896>laid<s%> his <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H7218>head<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> it <S%H7489>displeased<s%> <S%H5869><s%> him: and he held <S%H8551>up<s%> his <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H3027>hand,<s%> to <S%H5493>remove<s%> it <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H5921><s%> <S%H669>Ephraim's<s%> <S%H7218>head<s%> <S%H5921>unto<s%> <S%H4519>Manasseh's<s%> <S%H7218>head.<s%>

And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> his <S%H1>father,<s%> <S%H3808>Not<s%> <S%H3651>so,<s%> my <S%H1>father:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> is the <S%H1060>firstborn;<s%> <S%H7760>put<s%> thy right <S%H3225>hand<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> his <S%H7218>head.<s%>

And his <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H3985>refused,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> I <S%H3045>know<s%> it, my <S%H1121>son,<s%> I <S%H3045>know<s%> it: <S%H1931>he<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> shall <S%H1961>become<s%> a <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H1931>he<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> shall be <S%H1431>great:<s%> but <S%H199>truly<s%> his <S%H6996>younger<s%> <S%H251>brother<s%> shall be <S%H1431>greater<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> he, and his <S%H2233>seed<s%> shall <S%H1961>become<s%> a <S%H4393>multitude<s%> of <S%H1471>nations.<s%>

And he <S%H1288>blessed<s%> them <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> In thee shall <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H1288>bless,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7760>make<s%> thee as <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> and as <S%H4519>Manasseh:<s%> and he <S%H7760>set<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H4519>Manasseh.<s%>

And <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> <S%H595>I<s%> <S%H4191>die:<s%> but <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> you, and bring you <S%H7725>again<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of your <S%H1>fathers.<s%>

Moreover <S%H589>I<s%> have <S%H5414>given<s%> to thee <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7926>portion<s%> <S%H5921>above<s%> thy <S%H251>brethren,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H3947>took<s%> out of the <S%H4480>hand<s%> <S%H3027><s%> of the <S%H567>Amorite<s%> with my <S%H2719>sword<s%> and with my <S%H7198>bow.<s%>
